body_html: Yes, this is probably an issue because we del. We could fix that, however, it won't work. This is not supportable in the current state of affairs. Between the library loading, registration of gradients, and other actual things being run during import tensorflow, reloading is not easy to support.
body_text: Yes, this is probably an issue because we del. We could fix that, however, it won't work. This is not supportable in the current state of affairs. Between the library loading, registration of gradients, and other actual things being run during import tensorflow, reloading is not easy to support.
body: Yes, this is probably an issue because we `del`. We could fix that, however, it won't work. This is not supportable in the current state of affairs. Between the library loading, registration of gradients, and other actual things being run during `import tensorflow`, reloading is not easy to support.
